content:
Hello! Thanks for stopping by.

I'm Sam. I'm a University Lecturer and Registered Paramedic from Edinburgh, Scotland, working in healthcare eduction. I have recently been dabbling further in IT & Development whilst working in my role with Immersive Technologies & Simulation.

Although my current role is mainly in healthcare education, the luxury of the team I work within, is that I have ample opportunity to develop and implement new technologies, applications and projects.

The technologies and systems are healthcare focussed within my role. However, I continue to develop "pet projects" outside my role to maintain my learning and continue to develop.

I'm looking forward to the possibility of working with you!
